entry.title: Friday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 5.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind becoming west 20 km/h gusting to 40 this afternoon. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 18 this morning and minus 12 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Friday 20 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 7 with temperature rising to minus 1 by morning. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries overnight with risk of freezing rain. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light near midnight. Low minus 7 with temperature rising to minus 1 by morning. Wind chill minus 14 this evening. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Friday 20 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 1. POP 30%
